website_summaries.verdict: With a folding design and carry bag, this fire pit is ready for  your next adventure.
pros: Heat-resistant painted steel bowl and fire screen
Log grate, cooking grate, and fire tool included
Can also be used as a grill to cook
cons: Legs are a little small, but they need to be to collapse

customer_reviews.title: Good design.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the fire pit. The legs are flimsy, but they fold very easily and the retaining pins are about the best I've seen on anything. Once deployed, the legs appear to provide sufficient stability. The tool for removing the grate is a nice touch. I might have given 5 stars, but mine arrived with a bunch of scratches in the bottom of the bowl. Sure, I'm just gonna throw firewood in there, but I should get to be the one to scratch up my new fire pit you know?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Priebe

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, needs drain Hole though
customer_reviews.text: DRILL A 3/8 HOLE IN THE BOTTOM FOR DRAINAGE, tTHEN WATER WONT SIT AND RUST IT. PAINT THE LEVEL BELOW THE SMALL GRATE WITH 5 OR 6 COATS OF HIGH TEMP PAINT TO HELP PREVENT RUST. CLEAN OUT ASHES REGULARLY AS THEY HOLD WATER.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this particular model because it showed a cooking grate ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this particular model because it showed a cooking grate with a lift up door to let you add more wood or charcoal without having to actually remove the entire grate. It does not have that cooking grate, even though the manual also shows it with the lift up door. So if that feature is a part of your decision, be aware the new models do not have it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My family has enjoyed this fire pit several times in the last few weeks since I've received it. The only thing I really care about is it stays intact, which it has. I haven't had any issues with a flimsy bottom, though the legs are really wobbly. I've used the cooking rack several times. It's not the best quality and slightly warped the first time I used it. Otherwise a wonderful fire pit that has brought my family together!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be the "basket" of a gift basket being raffled off. It was so amazing I wished I would have been able to keep it. The 29-inch fire pit was huge. The additional items included seemed to be well made as well. Obviously, if you were going to transport it after use, you would have to plan ahead to make sure the pit was cooled down enough to be able to pull the pins in the legs and to put it in the carrying case for transport without burning the case.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: The Good: Foldable
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this fire pit for about 5 years. The Good: Foldable, has a mesh fire cover (Recommend using for safety reasons) and an elevated platform to allow oxygen to be introduced to the fire. The Bad: Rusts quite easily, keep dry.
customer_reviews.author: Rachk426

customer_reviews.title: It's not a $90 fire pit
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, if I saw it in a physical store, I'd pay no more than say, $50. It's OK quality. It arrived a bit bent, and I straightened the bowl out a touch with my hand. It comes with an ash grate, a cooking grate, a spark arrester, and a poker. One of the spring-loaded pins that locks the legs pulled out of the hole the first time I pulled it. I got it back together, but you have to be careful with them. The carry bag is a nice addition. Anyways, it's "meh".
customer_reviews.author: Sam R.

customer_reviews.title: It works fine, but it’s not super heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: It’s a small, inexpensive fire pit. I purchased this to take with me when I travel and camp. For the price I don’t have any real complaints and I like it folds up and came with a carry bag. It’s a bit lightweight and could be considered somewhat flimsy. So if you move it around pick it up, DONT DRAG IT, if you drag it you will likely bend one of the legs. Otherwise it suite my needs quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Trennepohl

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe -- legs are not reliable
customer_reviews.text: The legs are far too flimsy. If they were reliable and well built, I'd give this a higher rating. I wouldn't feel safe using this.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Sims

customer_reviews.title: A Great Little Portable Fire Pit for Camping
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for camping and love it. It is light weight and collapsible so it travels well and it held the lit fire without problem for a nice, early morning fire by the lake. It was so nice to just pour water in it to put the fire out, wipe it out and know it was ready and waiting whenever I wanted another fire, without damaging the ground under it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fire pit and a resonablet price
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire pit, easy to assemble, easy to carry, it is light weight and easy to clean, I enjoy it very much!! This is a great portable fire pit. The legs are attached and easily fold in so putting it away (comes with a carrying zip bag with handle) is a breeze. Had family (around 20 people) over during Thanksgiving, we made a campfire to warm 10-15 people around it. Used it for roasting marshmallows for the kiddos while the adult enjoy to fire drinking wine - it was wonderful and give good lighting, without too much smoke. Would recommend this folding firepit to anyone looking for something affordable, easy to assemble, easy to clean & put away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The materials aren't the greatest and I don't to get a lot of use ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a portable fire pit and this fit the bill for the budget I had set aside. I occasionally go camping at locations that allow fires, but you must bring your own elevated fire pit. The materials aren't the greatest and I don't to get a lot of use out of it before it falls apart, but given I will only use 2-3 times per year I should get a few years out of it before I need to replace it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Set Up and Maintain
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble...not even 5 minutes... very good size for a fireside round table chat... multiple grills for brindle and firewood... handles help with adding more wood as needed
customer_reviews.author: Alias Alias

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping and traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in our camper, which is quite small. I love that it folds up and has a carrying case! We used it almost non-stop on a cold, rainy 4 day camping weekend recently and it held up great. We used the grill feature to cook dinner, too. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Choobyfour

customer_reviews.title: Great for campfire where ground flames are not allowed, and great for cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. we used it over the weekend to: A: make a low fire to cook amazing blueberry cobbler in a cast iron pot surrounded by hot coals. and B: Make a tall-ish campfire to warm the 10-12 people around it, and give good lighting, without too much smoke. we used it with hardwood firewood and not with anything you would use to light a grill; just matches, tinder and wood. YMMV. Full disclosure: The amazing cobbler may have biased my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Portable and light weight...easy to pack up and carry.
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is portable and comes with a cloth carry case.I use it for camping at sites that don't have fire rings and require a pit with a bottom. It was easy to assemble and did the job. I read a review regarding it's legs not being sturdy, but found that they were flexible so that you could make sure it was even on uneven ground. It was easy to clean up and I can't wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: Estelle  Wolfman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little fire pit! Love it for our RV because it is very light and comes with a bag. Being light gauge steel, you have to be mindful of how hot you make your fire and how heavy the logs are.
customer_reviews.author: Broknex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill has been perfect for our backyard. It was easy to place in a pit we made and has served us great. We love the amount of fire it produces, which is also great for a large group.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Villien

customer_reviews.title: I've seen better quality pits for less money at Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. I've seen better quality pits for less money at Walmart. Its really loud when traveling... it would be nice if the travel case was padded to keep it quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: E are full-time RVers. It gives him the experience of a campfire without moving.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia M. Niehoff

customer_reviews.title: Great product, love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super for home or camping, fits in cover (a little tight but does fit) and stores easily in motorhome, has grate in the bottom making fire starting easier, has the grill for the top so great for bbq with wood or charcoal, best buy I have had in a long time for camping if no fire pit at the campground. Unfolds with the pull of a pin on each leg and closes just as easy, great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Monte L. Beers

customer_reviews.title: Great folding set-up
customer_reviews.text: The legs fold exactly as planned, and the width is plenty to get a great fire or cook a full meal. Lovely!
customer_reviews.author: deirdrebeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time on recent camping trip. Worked great, withstood the heat of burning logs without any noticeable deformities. Sprayed off when leaving and put away in carry bag. Outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Bama

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: It's not exactly heavy duty, but works. Purchased this to take with us while camping and does the job! If I was buying this to be stationary at home, I'd keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Fresinski

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to use. Be careful - the underside of the bowl gets very hot. Don't put anything flammable or meltable underneath the pit. We were very worried about putting it on the dry grass while camping and someone had the brilliant idea to put it on a tarp instead. Now that tarp has a wonderful melted patch. Just be careful about placement, otherwise it's great for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie H

customer_reviews.title: Great Firepit.
customer_reviews.text: Great firepit, we use it a few times a month for get togethers. The only downfall is it will rust quick so I would suggest buying a cover for it.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Mom

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought this.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fire pit. Folds down nice, way better price than the department stores.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great camping!
customer_reviews.text: Works great camping and carry case keeps from getting messy storage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable fire pit. The legs are attached and easily fold in so putting it away is a breeze. I haven't tried to cook on it, but we've used it for roasting marshmallows and it was wonderful. It contained the fire well and once we were done we cleaned it, folded it up, and put it in the bag that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Please send replacement ASAP
customer_reviews.text: We are SO disappointed that this fire pit arrived bent all around with wobbly legs. We are reordering via an exchange in hopes that we received a defective fire pit since we previewed so many good reviews before purchasing. PLEASE rush this exchange by this Friday, 10/26/18!
customer_reviews.author: abm

customer_reviews.title: Got the opportunity to set up a nice small fire
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as expected. You put wood in it and burn the wood. There weren't any bang marks or dents. The screws in the legs that attach them to the bowl were a little bit loose, but I was able to just tighten them by hand. Got the opportunity to set up a nice small fire, and make smores with my nieces. Great experience. A+, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Little wobbly but great for camping!
customer_reviews.text: The legs are a bit wobbly when set up but it worked great for my camping trip and took up 1/2 the room of my other pit that I'd been bringing out for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Super cute fire pit. Was a little disappointed because it came missing a nut for the back of the Bolt for one of the legs- but luckily we have a bunch in the garage because my husbands a wood worker. Fixed it right up and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: JAMReviews

customer_reviews.title: Working great, no regrets
customer_reviews.text: Working great! Folding legs are very good when storing it in my limited space in my garage. I would give 5 stars if grill mesh can be lifted higher up.
customer_reviews.author: Keiji Osada

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful so far
customer_reviews.text: We scouted out our campsite a few days before our trip and noticed it did not have a fire ring. I liked this one because it folded up and was larger than some of the others. I ordered it and received it the next day!!! It worked perfectly! Our family was also impressed. Well see in the long run how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Dolio5

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$
customer_reviews.text: Used the fire pit one time and a hole Burt through the bottom of it. Unfortunately I didn’t use t for the first time until after the return window...because it would’ve been returned in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Meemo

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is just what we wanted, as some camp grounds do not have fire pits.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Too Shallow for Fires
customer_reviews.text: Depth is approximately 5" - too shallow for most fires. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this easily portable fire ring
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this easily portable fire ring. When campground has a fire ban, we can still use this to cook on as long as we use the cover. The fold up legs and carrying case are super neat as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Bechel

customer_reviews.title: Very portable but...
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely portable but it rusts very quickly. Hoping to apply some rust-ending paint and then high-temp paint on top of that to extend the life of this fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I should have bought a slightly larger size. Works great but most logs are a little closer to 36 inches so the 29 inch size is a bit smaller than I should have bought. Other than that, easy assembly and storage, nice depth, etc. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Campfires Here We Come!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new fire pit ... large enough for a great fire and has a mesh cover! The only thing missing was a few holes in the bottom to let the air flow through for a great fire! Easily drilled some holes and now it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DoggieMomof1

customer_reviews.title: Great product. We have had tons of fires in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We have had tons of fires in it and it's still going strong! It does rust super easy tho even tho I have it covered where it's cool and dry the bottom is rusting. It hasn't effected the fires yet tho.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Item damaged when received
customer_reviews.text: We ordered for my son's campout birthday party. We received it and the box was in fine shape, but upon opening the outside of the fire ring was all damaged and beat up. We had to use it anyway as we had no other option at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: and it was perfect. Used charcoal for cooking
customer_reviews.text: We only camp occasionally, and it was perfect. Used charcoal for cooking, then switched to logs for a campfire. Loved that it came with cooking grill. Easy to put together. Easy to store in carrying case. No mess in car going home.
customer_reviews.author: From Long Island

customer_reviews.title: Review of Tool
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the tool to lift the screen was broke when I opened the box. It is cheaply made. I purchased this product after reading all the positive comments. Other than that item I'm okay with the product. I haven't used the fire box yet, but will do so when I go camping.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Garrahan

customer_reviews.title: if you need portability.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it then couldn't use it. But will at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret F.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'M SATISFIED WITH THIS..JUST DON'T LEAVE IT UNCOVERED AS IT WILL RUST..
customer_reviews.author: Huey P. Galatas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beach fires--or anywhere--where the law states the fire ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beach fires--or anywhere--where the law states the fire must be elevated off the ground. Very easy to transport, set up, and break down.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bird

customer_reviews.title: Okay for couple uses
customer_reviews.text: Was nice the day we got it but the legs are very flimsy and it rusted very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for packing in small spaces and it does its ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchaed this for my 5th-Wheel to use at the beach. It is perfect for packing in small spaces and it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: James A. McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting a well made product for the price. I was wrong. This fire pit is large enough for a good sized camp fire with 8 people around it. The legs fold out and in with no issues and the spring retainer pins worked great. Love the carry bag to keep it from getting our Camper dirty when traveling. I'd buy this again with no problem. We had about 12 fires in it on one camping trip and the finish doesn't seem affected at all.
customer_reviews.author: HPE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Used first time! We loved it! Hopefully will hold up well! So far, just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan A

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect for what we needed. Not the best quality but worked great for a long weekend where we wanted to bring a fire pit along.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Good fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit for camping in areas that don't have fire pits. Worked well. Slightly wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Satisified customer

customer_reviews.title: On the plus side it is a perfect size for a small fire and appears to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this fire pit for use while traveling in our motorhome. On the plus side it is a perfect size for a small fire and appears to be fairly well constructed. It is also very easy to stow back in the carrying bag for convenient storage. The only negative would be that the legs are a little bit flimsy but once you get it stabilized it's great .
customer_reviews.author: islandbum

customer_reviews.title: I like to camp in undeveloped areas and this works great
customer_reviews.text: I like to camp in undeveloped areas and this works great. Not too big and not too small. Easy for me to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Shonnie Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fire pit but storage bag could be a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: By Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These things work Great, and they were at a good price
customer_reviews.author: R. B. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: I have used this weekend. Great for camping, so fair very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Great for weekend camping trips! The legs are a little weak though. Definitely serves its purpose though.
customer_reviews.author: Erin N Donley

customer_reviews.title: Fun, worth the price, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this is by myself in under 15 minutes- miracle for me, truly. Was simple, very straight forward, and later that evening we were roasting s'mores. Wish there was a small hole in the bottom for drainage. Cleaning is quick and easy. The metal rack rusts fairly easily, but easy to take care of with appropriate cleaner and a coating of a non-flammable and heat resistant oil before and after use. LOVE the handy carrying case it comes with. Will be taking it to my mom's house in the spring. It seems a bit flimsy on first glance, but has held up just fine to repeated use and several rain storms. Much more durable than it seems at first.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Duff

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT for full timers. Legs fold and comes with a cool little bag to store it in. My RV neighbors are jealous
customer_reviews.author: DAVID OH

customer_reviews.title: Missing part off the bolts and nuts. Had sum ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing part off the bolts and nuts. Had sum in my garage that fit so made it work. Very flimsy though. Ok for weekend trips
customer_reviews.author: John Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Stows very well under the RV.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea for a small fire in the backyard for S'mores or just hanging out. No assembly and comes with a bag to take it easily where you need to. Have used it many times. The downside is that the lid rusts easy. Left it out overnight to cool off and the lid rusted over. Legs seem a bit wobbly, but it stands fine. All in all, great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: David Montaño

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, not a good folding leg design, slightly wobbly, however it heald lots of big heavy logs all weekend while camping, it was required that we used portable firepits at this campsite so very happy to have it, it's only ideal because it is portable, it does rust
customer_reviews.author: CDogg 5000

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire Pit but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit is great but it arrived with a damaged tool to remove the lid. I can't find any way to have them send me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Concannon

customer_reviews.title: Not particular sturdy, but is light weight and should meet my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is about what I expected for the price. Not particular sturdy, but is light weight and should meet my needs quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wannemacher

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY FOR A REASONABLE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE USED IT A HAND FULL OF TIMES ALREADY WITH FAMILY AND FRIENDS. I BURN EVERYTHING YOU CAN IMAGINE IN IT INCLUDING COALS AND IT HAS NOT DAMAGED THE PIT. IT HOLDS ENOUGH LOGS AT ONE TIME TO FULFILL MY FAMILY'S NEEDS. EASY TO USE, EASY TO CARRY, AND LEGS FOLD UP SO EASY TO STORE. NO COMPLAINTS HERE, GREAT PRODUCT !!
customer_reviews.author: Nico Rocco

customer_reviews.title: The fire pit came dented and bent, but it ...
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit came dented and bent, but it works ok. The wood handle on the fire poker was broken, but I kept it all anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my jeep to bring out onto the beach (you're required to have all fires in a metal container). This was a GREAT size, very lightweight. I wasn't too concerned about the sturdiness as I bury the feet into the sand to get it to be level. I'm curious to see how it will have held up over the winter in storage after being exposed to heat and the salty damp air, but if it died I'm sure I'll buy the same one again!
customer_reviews.author: David J. Conlon

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: As long as you keep it indoors tucked away from the elements/abuse when you're not using it... It's a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: JTK

customer_reviews.title: nice peice
customer_reviews.text: used twice since purchased for what it cost well worth it great for tailgating and easy clean up and storage with the casr that comes with it
customer_reviews.author: gregory laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect product for me. It folds up into its own storage bag so it's out-of-the-way when you don't need it and easily put together when you do. Bought it primarily for our RV, but it's also great for my backyard. Most camgrounds required that you elevate your campfire now, so this will be perfect for that purpose. This is small enough to put in one of my storage bins, and large enough to have a nice cozy fire under the stars.
customer_reviews.author: NancyK

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this fire pit
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit, is strong and strudy. I bought the pit for a retirement gift. I would recommend this fire pit, for personal use or as a gift. I'm was very please with my purchased. Delivery was extremely fast too.
customer_reviews.author: judy kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was missing the lift handle and the metal tool.
customer_reviews.author: George Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to keep in the bag after use.
customer_reviews.author: Lu Ee Peh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and so easy to set up! We are enjoying it on a weekly basis:)
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Works great for us
customer_reviews.text: Works great for us. Some campgrounds dont have fire pits so this is great. The carrying bag is a plus to keep everything protected for the next trip.
customer_reviews.author: phil cabernoch

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I'm having a great time with this portable fire pit! I've used it in my back yard and packed it over to a friend's house for an outdoor birthday party. There was zero assembly required, and even though it's light and compact, it's pretty sturdy. It's been a lot of fun to use. and I look forward to the next time we "fire it up!"
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is big enough to make a fire in, and it's portable. We took it to the beach several times during the summer for bonfires and had a great time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Bad zipper
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke on our first use. Other than that, product work great.
customer_reviews.author: Linh Pham

customer_reviews.title: This is my first fire pit.
customer_reviews.text: The cost was reasonable, I liked the accessories (screen cover, log tool, cover), and I liked the folding legs and portability of the fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: thomas r.

customer_reviews.title: easy to transport!
customer_reviews.text: kinda small but works well! comes with travel bag for packing it with you! handy for those "no ground fire" situations.
customer_reviews.author: jimatalltec

customer_reviews.title: Great for small patios and small storage area.
customer_reviews.text: Folding legs are a great feature for storing in a small area. Just big enough for a small patio area like I have.
customer_reviews.author: Albert D.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, easy to put together and easy to take down. I liked that it wasn't heavy but you it also makes you question how stable it could be. I had a few students knocked into it while the wood was burning and it wobbled a little bit leaving me scared that a leg would give out but it stayed up the entire 3 hours i used it, even with the heavy winds, people bumping into it and etc. I really like that it comes with a storage bag (not the best quality) for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: v2

customer_reviews.title: it's great that the legs come off and it's portable
customer_reviews.text: No problems whatsoever, it's great that the legs come off and it's portable.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Kostrzewa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping, folds nicely. We are happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Deb McCain

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I got this one and it is nice size. I love this. Since I use this on my back yard, I don't need carry back but it is nice to have also.
customer_reviews.author: Sang Y. Lee

customer_reviews.title: This isn't too bad and can be lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This isn't too bad and can be lots of fun. It just rusts very easily. It came with a missing screw on one of the legs so it's sorta wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lam

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten a chance to use it yet w/all the rain/sleet/snow...but it appears it will do the job intended. Check for assembly "tightness" of parts. Folded, its height/thickness is compact & the unit is relatively light - great for RV storage. Concern is its service life but maybe w/inside placed bottom heat protection (insulating it from the fire), its life can be prolonged. Smaller diameter would result in shorter wood sizing thus more work - wood cutting - to fit properly. Anxiously awaiting spring...
customer_reviews.author: Mack Miller

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money to buy a better quality fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money to buy a better quality fire pit! This thing is so unsteady and poorly made I immediately returned it upon opening. Guarantee this thing will not last more than a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility of this fire pit, goes with us on every camping trip!
customer_reviews.author: Shabali D

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Great price, compact and comes with a cooking grate which I like. I have not used it yet but I am concerned that it might not hold much wood in it but otherwise it seems like a great product.
customer_reviews.author: sathya

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! The screws and nuts did not fit. It came apart while we wr re trying to use it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Byrdia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and flimsy. Do not buy. Rusted immediately and hardware fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not heat safe
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed with this product. Used it for the first time to make s’mores and assumed it was safe on my deck and noticed it burnt and bubbled the wood after one use. Only giving 1 Star because I am required to.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Rusted within a year you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted it for have it out on my patio I only give it three stars because I’ve only had it approximately a year and the bottom has rusted out. I suppose if I put it away all the time would’ve lasted longer but I guess that’s not what I wanted to do. I also had to buy a new screen in the summer for it which really looks nice on it because the other one rested away so I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: To help give an idea of the size of this, it comes in a box that looks like you are getting a flat screen tv. The legs have a slight wobble but with weight it is fine. The convince of the bag is awesome because it keeps all of the mess in a contained area. The does have a rod for covering the fire, but I have yet to use it for cooking so I don't close it. Great for festivals, fairs, and car camping. You can get 10 chairs around this and still feel the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

product_meta.title: Fire Sense Portable Folding Round Black Steel 29 Inch Fire Pit with Carry Bag | Wood Burning | Mesh Spark Screen, Wood Grate, Cooking Grate, and Screen Lift Tool Included | Lightweight Patio
product_meta.description:
Size:29 inchMake your camping trips fun with this Portable Folding Fire Pit by Fire Sense.

This fire pit has been constructed with a 29 inch diameter heat resistant painted steel fire bowl and folding legs for easy portability. It comes with its own carry bag that allows you to carry it with you everywhere. Simply fold up this fire pit and stow it in your trunk for a contained cackling fire everywhere you go.

The fire pit kit comes with some basic accessories such as a one piece dome steel mesh fire screen, a wood grate, and a screen lift tool. The fire screen has been painted with high temperature paint to withstand strong flames and keep them contained. The screen lift tool helps in adding or removing the mesh screen while keeping your hands safe from the flames. The wood and cooking grates allow you to easily and quickly place the wood logs for burning. The fire pit grates also allow you a quick clean up process of the fire pit heater.

The ideal steel fire pit for a backyard, patio, or porch barbecue or bonfire as not only can you have a small campfire in your own backyard and roast marshmallows, but also enjoy time outside during the winter.

Made with high quality materials, this portable fire pit is built to last you through multiple camping trips over the years. Ideal for anyone who loves spending time outdoors and on the road, this wood burning outdoor fire pit also makes for an excellent gift to any outdoorsy person
feature_bullets: This outdoor fire pit measures 29 inches and is perfect for all your small fire needs.
This wood fire pit is very portable as it is foldable and collapsible.
This fire pit can accommodate many cooking essentials that can be stored in the bag.
This cooking fire pit uses wood as its source of fuel.
This fire pit for outside is the ideal outdoor and camping accessory.
